metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21723 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A Segmentation Fault issue discovered StreamSerializer::extractStreamsfunction in streamSerializer.cpp in oggvideotools 0.9.1 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via opening of crafted oggfile.

criterions.comment: oggvideotools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
